name: com.doji.midas
description: Monocular Depth Estimation with Unity Sentis

samples.description: Shared resources for samples. Any other samples depends on this to be imported.
Basic example on how to perform depth estimation with an input texture.
Basic example on how to perform depth estimation with a Webcam.
Basic example on how to perform depth estimation on a VideoPlayer texture.
Example on how to reduce lag by spreading the execution over multiple frames.
